recommendations.title: Authenticity and efficiency – use ready Asian sauces for rapid wok execution
recommendations.description:
Customers expect **bold, authentic flavors** delivered fast, especially in a high-volume, customizable setup like yours. Using ready-to-use Asian sauces like teriyaki, katsu, Pad Thai, chow mein, and sweet chilli helps your team nail both speed and consistency—every dish comes out tasting just right, every time.

These sauces make it easy to craft diverse wok, noodle, and poké recipes without the burden of scratch prep for each batch. You get reliable, balanced flavors that stand up to customer expectations, while also freeing up your crew to focus on freshness and presentation.

Keep these sauces as your go-to wok companions:
- Use Teriyaki Marinade for speedy bowl builds and glazes
- Blend Katsu Sauce into quick LTOs or bowl toppers
- Offer pad thai or chow mein as rotating options
- Sweet Chilli is perfect for dipping, drizzle, or as a poké/delivery add-on
You'll see smoother service during rushes, less margin for prep errors, and a menu that delivers big on flavor without slowing you down.

recommendations.title: Snackable streetfood excites diners – add Teriyaki Chicken Lollipops
recommendations.description:
Bite-sized, flavorful dishes are a top draw for Gen Z and families looking for a fun, shareable experience in a casual setting. Teriyaki Chicken Lollipops tie perfectly into the **streetfood couture trend** by offering a familiar Asian flavor profile with a playful, portable format—just right for both dine-in and takeaway snacks.

Practically, these lollipops add a **highly Instagrammable and snackable starter** or side for any occasion, including group meals and quick solo bites. They fill a menu gap by extending your chicken options into the finger food/snacking space, and align well with your existing teriyaki flavor systems and cooking methods.

You can position them as a **new starter or snack**—perfect for sharing or as an upsell alongside mains and bowls. Feature them as part of combo meals, or in snack boxes for delivery. Expect increased social buzz and impulse add-ons, helping drive repeat visits and check averages.
